newsitem.title: USA: Primestar names Daniel O'Brien as president.
newsitem.headline: Primestar names Daniel O'Brien as president.

text.p: Digital television entertainment service Primestar said on Wednesday that Daniel O'Brien, currently president of Time Warner Satellite Services, will become the company's president and chief operating officer.

In addition, Primestar named Kenneth Carroll as chief financial officer. The new managers will run the company after it is restructured as a publicly traded business called Primestar Inc, the company said in a statement.
The company also said it would move its corporate offices from Philadelphia to the Denver, Colorado, metro area in early 1998.
The move should be completed six months after the company's transition to a public company, Primestar said in a statement.
